note_data.note_text: Initial investigation shows database connection pool exhaustion. Restarting connection service to provide temporary relief while investigating root cause.
Initial investigation shows database connection pool exhaustion. Restarting connection service to provide temporary relief while investigating root cause.
Updated: Connection service restart successful. Database performance restored. Implementing permanent fix by increasing connection pool size.
